Title: Security update for the Linux Kernel (Live Patch 34 for SLE 12 SP2)

Notes.Text: Security update for the Linux Kernel (Live Patch 34 for SLE 12 SP2)
Notes.Title: Topic

Notes.Text:
This update for the Linux Kernel 4.4.121-92_129 fixes one issue.

The following security issue was fixed:

- CVE-2020-10757: Fixed an issue where remaping hugepage DAX to anon mmap could have caused user PTE access (bsc#1172437).
Notes.Title: Details

Notes.Title: Terms of Use

Relationships.RelatesToProductReference: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP2
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP2
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP2-LTSS
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP2-LTSS

Vulnerabilities.Description: A flaw was found in the Linux Kernel in versions after 4.5-rc1 in the way mremap handled DAX Huge Pages. This flaw allows a local attacker with access to a DAX enabled storage to escalate their privileges on the system.
